data.name: Velvet Armchair with Wood Legs
data.short_description: A luxurious velvet armchair with elegant wood legs, offering both comfort and sophistication for your living room, office, or reading nook.
data.description:
Overview
The Velvet Armchair with Wood Legs combines timeless elegance with modern comfort. The plush velvet upholstery adds a luxurious feel, while the sturdy wooden legs provide both support and style. This armchair is perfect for creating a cozy, sophisticated space in your living room, bedroom, or home office.

Design & Comfort
Designed for comfort and relaxation, this armchair features a soft velvet seat that feels inviting and smooth to the touch. The padded backrest and armrests offer support for long hours of sitting, whether you’re enjoying a book, entertaining guests, or simply unwinding.
data.extra_description:
• Plush velvet upholstery for a luxurious feel
  • Sturdy wooden legs for durability and support
  • Comfortable armrests and backrest for relaxation
  • Stylish design that suits various interior themes
  • Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, or home offices

translated_name.hn: लकड़ी के पैरों वाली मखमली आर्मचेयर
translated_name.ar: كرسي بذراعين من المخمل بأرجل خشبية

translated_short_description.en: A luxurious velvet armchair with elegant wood legs, offering both comfort and sophistication for your living room, office, or reading nook.
translated_short_description.hn: भव्य लकड़ी के पैरों वाली एक शानदार मखमली आर्मचेयर, जो आपके लिविंग रूम, ऑफिस या रीडिंग नुक्कड़ के लिए आराम और परिष्कार दोनों प्रदान करती है।
translated_short_description.ar: كرسي بذراعين فاخر من المخمل بأرجل خشبية أنيقة، يوفر الراحة والرقي لغرفة المعيشة أو المكتب أو زاوية القراءة الخاصة بك.

data.store_description: Your one-stop destination for modern appliances and stylish furniture, crafted to elevate comfort and design in every corner of your home.

data.name: Sleek Dining Chair for Kitchen or Dining Room
data.short_description: A sleek dining chair designed for both kitchen and dining rooms, offering a modern, minimalist look with comfortable seating for any dining space.
data.description:
Overview
This Sleek Dining Chair is designed to elevate your kitchen or dining room with its modern and minimalist style. Its clean lines and contemporary appeal make it the perfect addition to any dining area, combining both aesthetics and functionality in one stylish piece.

Design & Comfort
Crafted for comfort and style, the chair features a contoured seat that provides lasting support during meals and gatherings. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable dining experience, while the sleek profile adds a touch of elegance to your space.

Durability & Versatility
Made from high-quality materials, this dining chair is built to last and withstand daily use. Its versatile design easily complements various dining tables, whether you’re hosting a casual breakfast or a formal dinner, making it an ideal choice for both small and large spaces.

Easy Maintenance
The smooth surface of the chair makes it easy to clean, maintaining its sleek look even after regular use. Whether you have children or frequently entertain guests, this chair’s low-maintenance design ensures long-term practicality.
data.extra_description:
• Sleek, minimalist design for modern dining spaces
  • Comfortable, contoured seat for ergonomic support
  • Durable construction for long-lasting use
  • Versatile style that fits various dining room themes
  • Easy-to-clean surface for effortless maintenance

translated_name.en: Sleek Dining Chair for Kitchen or Dining Room
translated_name.hn: रसोई या भोजन कक्ष के लिए चिकनी डाइनिंग चेयर
translated_name.ar: كرسي طعام أنيق للمطبخ أو غرفة الطعام

translated_short_description.en: A sleek dining chair designed for both kitchen and dining rooms, offering a modern, minimalist look with comfortable seating for any dining space.
translated_short_description.hn: एक चिकनी डाइनिंग चेयर जिसे रसोई और भोजन कक्ष दोनों के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है, जो किसी भी भोजन स्थान के लिए आरामदायक बैठने के साथ एक आधुनिक, न्यूनतम रूप प्रदान करती है।
translated_short_description.ar: كرسي طعام أنيق مصمم لكل من المطبخ وغرفة الطعام، ويوفر مظهرًا عصريًا وبسيطًا مع مقاعد مريحة لأي مساحة لتناول الطعام.

variants.product_name: Sleek Dining Chair for Kitchen or Dining Room

data.name: Round Papasan Chair with Wooden Base
data.short_description: A cozy round papasan chair with a sturdy wooden base, offering ultimate comfort and a stylish, relaxed seating option for any space.
data.description:
Overview
The Round Papasan Chair with Wooden Base brings comfort and style to any room. Featuring a large, circular cushion that offers ample seating space, this chair is perfect for lounging, reading, or simply relaxing. Its unique design combines a plush seat with a durable wooden base, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere.

Design & Comfort
The oversized, cushioned seat provides a soft and supportive resting spot, while the round shape cradles your body for maximum comfort. Its flexible design allows you to adjust the cushion to your preferred sitting position, ensuring a relaxed seating experience every time.

Durability & Sturdiness
Crafted with a sturdy wooden base, this papasan chair is built to last. The solid structure provides reliable support, while the cushioned seat ensures you stay comfortable for hours. Ideal for both indoor use and casual spaces, this chair is a durable and long-lasting addition to your home.

Versatile & Stylish
The round shape and wooden base bring a blend of traditional and contemporary design elements to your space. The chair’s cozy, inviting look makes it perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or even reading nooks. Choose from a variety of cushion colors to match your décor.
data.extra_description:
• Round, cushioned seat for ultimate comfort
  • Sturdy wooden base for reliable support
  • Adjustable cushion for personalized seating
  • Versatile design that complements various décor styles
  • Ideal for lounging, reading, or casual seating
 
4o mini

translated_name.en: Round Papasan Chair with Wooden Base
translated_name.hn: लकड़ी के आधार वाली गोल पापासन कुर्सी

translated_short_description.en: A cozy round papasan chair with a sturdy wooden base, offering ultimate comfort and a stylish, relaxed seating option for any space.
translated_short_description.hn: एक मजबूत लकड़ी के आधार वाली आरामदायक गोल पापासन कुर्सी, जो किसी भी स्थान के लिए परम आराम और एक स्टाइलिश, आरामदायक बैठने का विकल्प प्रदान करती है।
translated_short_description.ar: كرسي باباسان دائري مريح بقاعدة خشبية متينة، يوفر أقصى درجات الراحة وخيار جلوس أنيق ومريح لأي مساحة.

data.name: Retro Folding Chair for Outdoor Use
data.short_description: A retro folding chair designed for outdoor use, combining vintage style with convenience and portability for a comfortable seating experience.
data.description:
Overview
The Retro Folding Chair for Outdoor Use brings a touch of nostalgic charm to your outdoor spaces. With its classic design and practical folding feature, this chair offers a comfortable, stylish solution for relaxing in the garden, on the patio, or at the beach.

Design & Comfort
Inspired by retro aesthetics, this folding chair features a sturdy frame and a comfortable seat that provides optimal relaxation. Its breathable fabric ensures you stay cool and comfortable, whether you're enjoying a sunny afternoon or attending an outdoor event.

Durability & Portability
Built to withstand the elements, the retro folding chair is crafted from durable materials, making it perfect for outdoor use. The lightweight design allows for easy portability, while the folding mechanism ensures convenient storage and transport.

Versatile Use
Whether you're lounging by the pool, camping, or attending a picnic, this chair is versatile enough to suit a variety of outdoor activities. The retro design adds a fun and stylish flair to any outdoor setting, while its functionality ensures a comfortable seating experience.
data.extra_description:
• Retro design for a nostalgic look
  • Lightweight, folding mechanism for easy storage and transport
  • Durable materials built for outdoor use
  • Comfortable and breathable fabric seat
  • Perfect for camping, picnics, and other outdoor activities

translated_name.en: Retro Folding Chair for Outdoor Use
translated_name.hn: आउटडोर उपयोग के लिए रेट्रो फोल्डिंग चेयर
translated_name.ar: كرسي طي بتصميم قديم للاستخدام الخارجي

translated_short_description.en: A retro folding chair designed for outdoor use, combining vintage style with convenience and portability for a comfortable seating experience.
translated_short_description.hn: आउटडोर उपयोग के लिए डिज़ाइन की गई एक रेट्रो फोल्डिंग चेयर, जो आरामदायक बैठने के अनुभव के लिए विंटेज शैली को सुविधा और पोर्टेबिलिटी के साथ जोड़ती है।
translated_short_description.ar: كرسي طي بتصميم قديم مصمم للاستخدام الخارجي، يجمع بين الطراز القديم والراحة وسهولة الحمل لتجربة جلوس مريحة.

variants.product_name: Retro Folding Chair for Outdoor Use

data.name: Modern Plastic Dining Chair in Vibrant Red
data.short_description: A modern plastic dining chair in vibrant red, designed for comfort and style, perfect for adding a pop of color to your dining space.
data.description:
Overview
This Modern Plastic Dining Chair in vibrant red brings a bold, contemporary touch to your dining area. With its sleek, minimalist design and eye-catching color, it’s the perfect addition to any modern home.

Design & Comfort
Featuring a simple yet functional design, this dining chair offers a comfortable seating experience with a contoured backrest and smooth plastic surface. Its ergonomic shape ensures lasting comfort for meals, gatherings, and casual seating.

Durable & Easy to Maintain
Crafted from high-quality plastic, the chair is durable and easy to clean, making it ideal for everyday use. The lightweight design allows for easy movement and rearrangement, while its sturdy construction provides reliable support.

Versatile & Stylish
The vibrant red color adds a pop of color to your dining room, kitchen, or any casual seating area. Its modern look pairs perfectly with a wide range of table styles and interior designs, making it a versatile choice for your home.
data.extra_description:
• Bold vibrant red color for a modern look
  • Ergonomic design for comfort
  • Durable, easy-to-clean plastic material
  • Lightweight and sturdy construction
  • Versatile and stylish addition to any space

translated_name.en: Modern Plastic Dining Chair in Vibrant Red

data.name: Classic Rocking Chair with White Cushion
data.short_description: A classic rocking chair with a comfortable white cushion, offering a perfect blend of relaxation and timeless style for any room.
data.description: Relax in style with this Classic Rocking Chair, featuring a traditional design complemented by a soft white cushion for extra comfort. The sturdy frame provides a smooth rocking motion, making it ideal for unwinding after a long day. Crafted with durable wood, this chair adds a touch of elegance and warmth to any living room, nursery, or porch. The neutral white cushion enhances the chair's versatility, ensuring it seamlessly blends with a variety of interior styles. Whether you're enjoying a quiet moment of relaxation or rocking a little one to sleep, this classic rocking chair offers both comfort and charm.

translated_name.en: Classic Rocking Chair with White Cushion
translated_name.hn: सफेद कुशन वाली क्लासिक रॉकिंग चेयर

translated_short_description.en: A classic rocking chair with a comfortable white cushion, offering a perfect blend of relaxation and timeless style for any room.
translated_short_description.hn: एक आरामदायक सफेद कुशन वाली क्लासिक रॉकिंग चेयर, जो किसी भी कमरे के लिए विश्राम और कालातीत शैली का एक आदर्श मिश्रण पेश करती है।
translated_short_description.ar: كرسي هزاز كلاسيكي مع وسادة بيضاء مريحة، يوفر مزيجًا مثاليًا من الاسترخاء والأناقة الخالدة لأي غرفة.

data.name: Sleek 7-Drawer Dresser with Tapered
data.short_description: A sleek 7-drawer dresser with tapered legs, offering ample storage and a modern, stylish design for any bedroom or living space.
data.description: This Sleek 7-Drawer Dresser combines modern design with practical storage, featuring seven spacious drawers to keep your clothes and accessories neatly organized. The stylish tapered legs and smooth finish give the dresser a contemporary, minimalist look that complements any room. Its clean lines and versatile design make it a perfect fit for various décor styles, from modern to mid-century. The dresser’s durable construction ensures long-lasting use, while its functional design allows for easy access to your belongings. Ideal for bedrooms, entryways, or living rooms, this dresser enhances your space with both style and storage capacity.

translated_name.ar: دولاب أنيق بسبعة أدراج مع تصميم مائل

translated_short_description.en: A sleek 7-drawer dresser with tapered legs, offering ample storage and a modern, stylish design for any bedroom or living space.
translated_short_description.hn: पतली नुकीली टांगों वाला 7-ड्रॉअर ड्रेसर, जो किसी भी शयनकक्ष या लिविंग स्पेस के लिए पर्याप्त भंडारण और एक आधुनिक, स्टाइलिश डिज़ाइन प्रदान करता है।
translated_short_description.ar: خزانة ملابس أنيقة ذات 7 أدراج بأرجل مدببة، توفر مساحة تخزين واسعة وتصميمًا عصريًا وأنيقًا لأي غرفة نوم أو غرفة معيشة.

data.name: Retro Vanity Set with Floral Accents
data.short_description: A charming retro vanity set with floral accents, offering a vintage-inspired design combined with modern functionality for a stylish grooming space.
data.description: Add a touch of vintage elegance to your space with this Retro Vanity Set, beautifully adorned with delicate floral accents. The set features a spacious tabletop for your beauty essentials, along with drawers for organized storage of cosmetics and accessories. The mirror provides a clear reflection, while the charming floral details bring a soft, nostalgic feel to the room. Perfect for creating a chic, retro-inspired dressing area, this vanity set blends classic style with contemporary practicality. Whether placed in a bedroom, dressing room, or personal beauty nook, it’s a timeless piece that enhances your space with both functionality and flair.

translated_name.en: Retro Vanity Set with Floral Accents
translated_name.hn: फ्लोरल ऐक्सेंट्स के साथ रेट्रो वैनिटी सेट
translated_name.ar: طقم تجميل عتيق مع لمسات زهرية

translated_short_description.en: A charming retro vanity set with floral accents, offering a vintage-inspired design combined with modern functionality for a stylish grooming space.
translated_short_description.hn: फ्लोरल ऐक्सेंट्स के साथ एक आकर्षक रेट्रो वैनिटी सेट, जो एक विंटेज-प्रेरित डिज़ाइन के साथ आधुनिक कार्यक्षमता प्रदान करता है, जो एक स्टाइलिश ग्रूमिंग स्पेस के लिए है।
translated_short_description.ar: طقم تجميل عتيق مع لمسات زهرية، يقدم تصميمًا مستوحى من الطراز القديم مع وظائف حديثة لمساحة تزيين أنيقة.

data.name: Modern Vanity Set with 10-Light Mirror
data.short_description: A modern vanity set with a 10-light mirror, offering a glamorous, well-lit space for makeup application and grooming.
data.description: Transform your beauty routine with this Modern Vanity Set, featuring a stunning 10-light mirror that provides optimal lighting for flawless makeup application and grooming. The sleek, contemporary design of the vanity set offers ample storage space, with drawers to keep your cosmetics, brushes, and accessories organized. The well-lit mirror ensures you always have the perfect lighting, whether you’re getting ready for the day or evening. Crafted with high-quality materials, this vanity set combines style, functionality, and elegance, making it an ideal addition to any modern bedroom, dressing room, or beauty space.

data.name: Minimalist Wooden Dressing Table with Mirror
data.short_description: A minimalist wooden dressing table with a sleek mirror, offering a clean, stylish space to organize your beauty essentials and create a tranquil dressing area.
data.description: Elevate your bedroom or dressing room with this Minimalist Wooden Dressing Table, designed to provide both style and functionality. Featuring a simple, clean-lined wooden frame, this table offers a spacious surface for your beauty and grooming essentials. The sleek mirror adds a touch of elegance, offering a clear reflection for your daily routine. With storage options to keep your items neatly organized, this dressing table helps create a serene and clutter-free space. The minimalist design complements a variety of interior styles, bringing modern charm and timeless appeal to your home.
